overview:
Dr. Andy Lilly has over 20 years of leadership experience covering voice, video and IP software technologies. As Director of Engineering at Trinity Convergence he built a world-leading team of voice and video-over-IP developers providing software solutions for customers such as Sony and Philips. Previous Development Manager roles at Nortel Networks and Radiant Networks included delivering software and hardware for broadband mesh networks, Internet over power lines, novel MPLS network routers, terabit optical switches and various military radio, radar and adaptive antenna applications. Most recently, Andy led several software developments for Europeâ€™s principal satellite developer, EADS Astrium.

Andy holds a PhD in radar modeling from University College London and a BEng Hons from the University of Surrey.
